volume1_ch5_chi: χ defines the temporal parameter with respect to which periodicity of FSMs is measured.
volume1_ch4_mu: The μ-weighted Laplacian δ²_μ couples local metric to wave stability.
volume1_ch6_lambda: Curvature λ enters the wave equation and supplies confinement.
volume1_ch7_psi: ψ defines the oscillatory content of Ψ and the resonance amplitude.
volume1_ch8_sigma: Σ acts as the selection mechanism that filters out non-stable modes.
volume2_ch2: Attractors generalize FSMs by imposing additional curvature, mass, and normalization stability constraints.
